title: Type for language school logo
content:
Hi guys,

I’ve got problems choosing the right type for this logo. It’s supposed to represent a private language school named English Academy.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090827081659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_v4_500_5428.jpg)

(Don’t mind the colour scheme please.)  
Could you suggest me a suitable sans type which is not too bold and would complement the logo well? Also I’m not sure about the placement of text, do you have any other ideas?

Thanks =)
author: Sivay
